datasets.name: 7f08b1b4
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
)
SELECT
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  * EXCEPT(window, granularity, slice_key, slice_value)
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE
  log_type = "INPUT"
  AND quantiles IS NOT NULL
  AND column_name != ":table"
  AND Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: 9e39d2d1
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
)
SELECT *, "No Slice" AS `Slice Key`, "No Slice" AS `Slice Value` FROM last_window_in_inspection_range

datasets.name: 3ca405f7
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
)
SELECT 
  column_name,
  ks_test.statistic AS `KS test`,
  ks_test.pvalue AS `KS test p-value`,
  population_stability_index AS PSI,
  wasserstein_distance AS WD,
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
FROM drift_metrics_inspected
WHERE ks_test is NOT NULL -- limit to numerical columns
  
  -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE DRIFT DETECTION
  
  AND ks_test.pvalue < 0.05
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
  AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window
  AND column_name != ":table"

datasets.name: 690db837
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
perWindowData AS (
  SELECT
  column_name,
  percent_null,
  num_nulls,
  count AS row_count,
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name != ":table"
),
perWindowDriftData AS (
  SELECT
  column_name,
  percent_null_delta,
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM drift_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- Only look at consecutive drift
  AND column_name != ":table"
)
SELECT
  df1.column_name,
  df1.`Slice key`,
  df1.`Slice value`,
  df1.`Granularity`,
  percent_null_delta,
  percent_null,
  num_nulls,
  row_count,
  df1.Window
FROM perWindowData df1 LEFT JOIN perWindowDriftData df2 ON df1.column_name = df2.column_name AND df1.Window=df2.Window AND df1.Granularity = df2.Granularity AND df1.`Slice key` = df2.`Slice key` AND df1.`Slice value` = df2.`Slice value`
-- CHANGE THRESHOLD BELOW TO TUNE THE SENSITIVITY OF THE QUERY
WHERE percent_null >=5

datasets.name: 9c6a6c5e
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics_inspected) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
exploded_frequent_items AS (
	SELECT
		EXPLODE(frequent_items) AS frequent_item,
		* EXCEPT (frequent_items)
	FROM profile_metrics_inspected
),
frequency_over_time AS (
SELECT
	column_name,
	COALESCE(CAST(frequent_item.item AS STRING), "null")  AS value,
	frequent_item.count AS count,
	count AS total_count,
	window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
FROM exploded_frequent_items
WHERE log_type = "INPUT"),
categorical_cols_high_drift AS (
	SELECT column_name 
	FROM drift_metrics_inspected
	WHERE chi_squared_test.pvalue < 0.05
  	AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
  	AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window
  	AND column_name != ":table"
),
frequency_rank_last_window AS (
	SELECT 
	-- identifiers
	column_name, Granularity, `Slice key`, `Slice value`,
	value, count, 
	dense_rank() over (
	partition by (column_name, Granularity, `Slice key`, `Slice value`) 
	ORDER BY count DESC, value asc
	) AS frequency_rank
	FROM frequency_over_time
	WHERE Window = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window
	AND column_name IN (SELECT * FROM categorical_cols_high_drift)
)

SELECT 
	df1.*, df1.count / df1.total_count AS percent
FROM frequency_over_time df1 JOIN 
(SELECT * FROM frequency_rank_last_window WHERE frequency_rank <= :top_k) df2
ON df1.column_name = df2.column_name 
AND df1.Granularity = df2.Granularity
AND df1.`Slice key` = df2.`Slice key`
AND df1.value = df2.value

datasets.name: f7905458
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
)
SELECT 
  concat(window.start," - ", window.end) AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  -- CHANGE THRESHOLD BELOW TO TUNE THE SENSITIVITY OF THE QUERY
  SUM(CASE WHEN percent_zeros >=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE
  window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
	AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name != ":table"
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4

datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range

last_window_in_inspection_range AS (

  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
)
SELECT
  column_name,
  percent_null,
  num_nulls,
  window.start AS Window_Start,
  window.end AS Window_End,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name != ":table"

datasets.name: d3351380
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
problematic_columns AS (
  SELECT
    column_name,
    granularity AS Granularity,
    COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
    COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  -- 
  -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE PROBLEMATIC ZEROS DETECTION
  -- 
  percent_null >=5
  AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name != ":table"
),
problematic_columns_over_time AS (
  SELECT
    column_name,
    percent_null,
    num_nulls,
    window.start AS Window,
    granularity AS Granularity,
    COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
    COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected df1)
SELECT df1.*
FROM problematic_columns_over_time df1
JOIN problematic_columns df2
ON df1.column_name = df2.column_name AND df1.Granularity=df2.Granularity AND df1.`Slice key` = df2.`Slice key` AND df1.`Slice value` = df2.`Slice value`

datasets.name: 2f6dc02a
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics_inspected) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
)
SELECT 
  concat(window.start," - ", window.end) AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  --
  -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE DRIFT DETECTION
  --
  SUM(IF(chi_squared_test.pvalue < 0.05,1,0)) AS count
FROM drift_metrics_inspected
WHERE ks_test is NULL -- limit to categorical columns
AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
AND Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4

WITH

datasets.name: 940e5375
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
perWindowData AS (
  SELECT
  column_name,
  percent_zeros,
  num_zeros,
  count AS row_count,
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name != ":table"
),
perWindowDriftData AS (
  SELECT
  column_name,
  percent_zeros_delta,
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM drift_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- Only look at consecutive drift
  AND column_name != ":table"
)
SELECT
  df1.column_name,
  df1.`Slice key`,
  df1.`Slice value`,
  df1.`Granularity`,
  percent_zeros_delta,
  percent_zeros,
  num_zeros,
  row_count,
  df1.Window
FROM perWindowData df1 LEFT JOIN perWindowDriftData df2 ON df1.column_name = df2.column_name AND df1.Window=df2.Window AND df1.Granularity = df2.Granularity AND df1.`Slice key` = df2.`Slice key` AND df1.`Slice value` = df2.`Slice value`
-- CHANGE THRESHOLD BELOW TO TUNE THE SENSITIVITY OF THE QUERY
WHERE percent_zeros >=5

datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics_inspected) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
)
SELECT
  column_name,
  percent_zeros,
  COALESCE(CAST(num_zeros AS STRING), "N/A") AS num_zeros,
  window.start AS Window_Start,
  window.end AS Window_End,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE
  column_name != ":table"
	AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)

datasets.name: 42a02067
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
)
SELECT 
  concat(window.start," - ", window.end) AS Window, 
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  --
  -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE DRIFT DETECTION
  --
  SUM(IF(ks_test.pvalue < 0.05,1,0)) AS count
FROM drift_metrics_inspected
WHERE ks_test is NOT NULL -- limit to numerical columns
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
  AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4

datasets.name: 9c7d8c0e
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
)
SELECT
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  * EXCEPT(window, granularity, slice_key, slice_value)
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE log_type = "INPUT"
  AND quantiles IS NULL
  AND column_name != ":table"
ORDER BY window.end DESC

datasets.name: 0b72b4a2
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
high_drift_columns AS (
  SELECT distinct column_name
  FROM drift_metrics_inspected
  WHERE ks_test is NOT NULL -- limit to numerical columns
  --
  -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE DRIFT DETECTION
  --
  AND ks_test.pvalue < 0.05
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
  AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window within range
  AND column_name != ":table"
)
SELECT 
  column_name,
  ks_test.statistic AS `KS test`,
  ks_test.pvalue AS `KS test p-value`,
  population_stability_index AS PSI,
  wasserstein_distance AS WD,
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
FROM drift_metrics_inspected
WHERE ks_test is NOT NULL -- limit to numerical columns
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
  AND column_name IN (SELECT column_name FROM high_drift_columns)

datasets.name: f5a6d570
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
),
problematic_columns AS (
  SELECT
    column_name,
    granularity AS Granularity,
    COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
    COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  -- 
  -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE PROBLEMATIC ZEROS DETECTION
  -- 
  percent_zeros >=5
  AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name != ":table"
),
problematic_columns_over_time AS (
  SELECT
    column_name,
    percent_zeros,
    num_zeros,
    window.start AS Window,
    granularity AS Granularity,
    COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
    COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected df1)
SELECT df1.*
FROM problematic_columns_over_time df1
JOIN problematic_columns df2
ON df1.column_name = df2.column_name AND df1.Granularity=df2.Granularity AND df1.`Slice key` = df2.`Slice key` AND df1.`Slice value` = df2.`Slice value`

datasets.name: 7458231d
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
),
table_profile_over_time AS (
SELECT
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  * EXCEPT(window, granularity, slice_key, slice_value)
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE
  log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name = ":table"),
threshold AS (
  SELECT 
  Granularity, 
  `Slice key`, 
  `Slice value`, 
  median(count) AS threshold 
  FROM table_profile_over_time 
  GROUP BY 1,2,3
  )
SELECT df2.threshold, df1.*
FROM table_profile_over_time df1 
LEFT JOIN threshold df2 
ON df1.Granularity = df2.Granularity
AND df1.`Slice key`=df2.`Slice key`
AND df1.`Slice value`=df2.`Slice value`

datasets.name: 3c9febf4
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
)
SELECT
  column_name,
  count AS row_count,
  concat(window.start," - ", window.end) AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`
  FROM profile_metrics_inspected
  WHERE
  window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window
  AND log_type = "INPUT"
  AND column_name = ":table"
ORDER BY row_count DESC

datasets.name: fae0075e
datasets.query:
WITH 
profile_metrics AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
last_window_in_inspection_range AS (
  SELECT window.start AS Window, granularity AS Granularity FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE window.start = (SELECT MAX(window.start) FROM profile_metrics) 
  ORDER BY Granularity LIMIT 1 -- order to ensure the `granularity` selected is stable
),
profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM profile_metrics
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
),
drift_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT * FROM `amine_elhelou`.`monitoring_dq`.`silver_transaction_drift_metrics`
  WHERE Granularity = (SELECT Granularity FROM last_window_in_inspection_range)
  AND window.start >= :`Time Window Start` AND window.end <= :`Time Window End` -- limit to the inspection time window range
  AND isnull(slice_key) AND isnull(slice_value) -- default to "No Slice"
),
profile_over_time AS (SELECT
  window.start AS Window,
  granularity AS Granularity,
  COALESCE(slice_key, "No slice") AS `Slice key`,
  COALESCE(slice_value, "No slice") AS `Slice value`,
  * EXCEPT(window, granularity, slice_key, slice_value)
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE
  log_type = "INPUT"
  AND quantiles IS NOT NULL
  AND column_name != ":table"
  ),
high_drift_columns AS (
  SELECT distinct column_name
  FROM drift_metrics_inspected
  WHERE ks_test is NOT NULL -- limit to numerical columns
   -- CHANGE METRIC AND THRESHOLDS BELOW TO TUNE DRIFT DETECTION
  AND ks_test.pvalue < 0.05
  AND drift_type = "CONSECUTIVE" -- only consider consecutive drift
  AND window.start = (SELECT Window FROM last_window_in_inspection_range) -- limit to last window
  AND column_name != ":table"
)
SELECT *
FROM profile_over_time  
WHERE column_name IN (SELECT column_name FROM high_drift_columns)

columns.description: Compares observed and expected frequencies of categorical variables to detect if they are statistically different
columns.title: Chi-squared test

frame.description: We use the Chi-square p-value to determine statistically significant change between categorical variables. You can configure the test used with the underlying query.
frame.title: Columns with High Categorical Distribution Change in the Last Time Window

invisibleColumns.description: Measures the difference between two probability distributions by calculating the absolute difference of their CDFs, useful for anomaly detection in continuous data.
invisibleColumns.name: TVD
invisibleColumns.title: TVD

invisibleColumns.description: Measures the independence of items in a dataset, detecting drift in categorical profiles by identifying changes in item dependencies.
invisibleColumns.name: LID
invisibleColumns.title: LID

invisibleColumns.description: Measures the similarity between two probability distributions, useful for detecting drift in categorical profiles by identifying changes in distribution similarity.

widget.name: e1a4542b
widget.textbox_spec:
#### We run 4 categorical drift tests to detect change in the categorical distribution:
1) [Chi-squared test](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chi-squared_test)
2) [TVD (Total Variance Distance)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_variation_distance_of_probability_measures)
3) [LID (Local Item Independence)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chebyshev_distance)
4) [JSD (Jensen–Shannon Divergence)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jensen%E2%80%93Shannon_divergence)

frame.description: Track how the volume of data has been changing over time.
frame.title: Row Count Over Time

frame.description: Inspect numerical metrics over time windows
frame.title: Numerical Data Profile Over Time

widget.name: 0539e7c8
widget.textbox_spec:
#### We run 3 numerical drift tests to detect change in the numerical distribution:
1) [KS test (Kolmogorov-Smirnov test)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kolmogorov%E2%80%93Smirnov_test)
2) [PSI (Population Stability Index)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kullback%E2%80%93Leibler_divergence) 
3) [WD (Wasserstein Distance)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wasserstein_metric)
